CharacterList.Name: Thor
CharacterList.Description: As the Norse God of thunder and lightning, Thor wields one of the greatest weapons ever made, the enchanted hammer Mjolnir. While others have described Thor as an over-muscled, oafish imbecile, he's quite smart and compassionate.  He's self-assured, and he would never, ever stop fighting for a worthwhile cause.

CharacterList.Name: Thor (Goddess of Thunder)
CharacterList.Description: When the Odinson lost his ability to wield Mjolnir, the role of Thor, God of Thunder, was left unoccupied…albeit for a short time. A mysterious female figure picked up the hammer with ease, changing the inscription to fit her status as the Goddess of Thunder.
